posts.post_title: For Sale, Hal Chase Paul Thompson T205 image photo
posts.post_content:
Hal Chase type 1 Paul Thompson photo. PSA authenticated and slabbed. Same photo used to create Hal's iconic T205 card, among several others. I'm thinking about possibly letting this go. I'll also include a PSA 3 T205 Chase w/ Cycle back as a companion piece. Asking $4500[IMG]https://uploads.tapatalk-cdn.com/20220317/b780b746c2905b08e23e78e68a507023.jpg[/IMG][IMG]https://uploads.tapatalk-cdn.com/20220317/f0e7280c3be21ded458526164c1102af.jpg[/IMG][IMG]https://uploads.tapatalk-cdn.com/20220317/c76173aaf463e94a9dda95fd25eff5da.jpg[/IMG]
